attributes.action: legalize farming hemp growth for the environent
attributes.additional_details: Legalise the growth of hemp for uses such as paper, food, clothing, fuel, energy. On the government website it says that the environmental department wants to save the environment for future generations.  The answer is simple. A self sustainable product that grows back to its previous years yield every year. Farmers have to apply and pay for a licence to grow hemp. A product which can change the future of our country for the better.
